
{{alias}}( value )
    Tests if a value is a square matrix which equals its transpose.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        Value to test.

    Returns
    -------
    bool: boolean
        Boolean indicating whether a value is a symmetric matrix.

    Examples
    --------
    > var mat = {{alias:@stdlib/ndarray/ctor}}( 'generic', 2 );
    > var M = mat( [ 0, 1, 1, 2 ], [ 2, 2 ], [ 2, 1 ], 0, 'row-major' );
    > var bool = {{alias}}( M )
    true
    > bool = {{alias}}( [ 1, 2, 3, 4 ] )
    false
    > bool = {{alias}}( 3.14 )
    false
    > bool = {{alias}}( {} )
    false

    See Also
    --------
